[+1487] Government drug adviser David Nutt sacked
item.description: Professor David Nutt was asked to resign after his claims ecstasy and LSD were less dangerous than alcohol.

[+647] Claim: NH cop being turfed for supporting pot legalization
item.description: A police officer who once confronted Sen. John McCain about marijuana decriminalization is being silenced and possibly pushed out of his job with a New Hampshire police force for speaking out against marijuana prohibition, his supporters say.

item.title: [+586] How Different Age Groups Celebrate Halloween (COMIC)
[+584] Teens Sue School Over Punishment For Racy MySpace Pics
item.description: INDIANAPOLIS: Two sophomore girls have sued their school district after they were punished for posting sexually suggestive photos on MySpace during their summer vacation. The American Civil Liberties Union, in a federal lawsuit filed last week on behalf of the girls, argues that Churubusco High School violated the girls's free speech.

item.title: [+568] RARE PHOTOS: Giant Squid Eaten by Sperm Whale
item.description: ''Absolutely sensational'' new pictures are rare proof that the world's largest toothed whales feed on elusive giant squid. And if researchers are right, the photos may also show a baby whale's hunting lessons.

item.title: [+550] Firefox 4.0 Interface For Linux Mocked-up
item.description: Version 4 will see a raft of major new features and improvements – not least of which is the refined interface above. Another major addition will be Browser Sync via Mozilla Weave, allowing for cloud syncing of bookmarks, passwords and favourites.

item.title: [+541] Celebrities .Then and now. One more time [Pics]
[+511] The New A-Team
item.description: Man, I could've swore Bradley Cooper and Rampage Jackson were a little taller.

item.title: [+508] Federal Reserve Policy Audit Legislation "Gutted" Paul Says
item.description: Representative Ron Paul, the Texas Republican who has called for an end to the Federal Reserve, said legislation he introduced to audit monetary policy has been "gutted" while moving toward a possible vote in theDemocratic-controlled House.

item.title: [+487] Adult Film Star Raven Alexis is a dedicated gamer
item.description: When porn star Raven Alexis isn't busy getting busy on camera, she's a hardcore gamer who likes modding PC's

item.title: [+481] Tetris'D = Tetris + Platformer
item.description: You are a stick figure stuck in a game of Tetris. Don't let yourself get crushed!

item.title: [+434] Underground CERN: it’s Half-Life in real-life (PICS)
item.description: It’s one of the greatest games of all time. You clamber over pipes and through ducts. Cables of unclear electrical status dangle uncomfortably close to puddles of water. Tunnels lit by rudimentary emergency lighting lead on and on past a hissing steam pipe, then dripping water, then silence, until the darkness slowly reveals a moist and fleshy lump

item.title: [+428] Joker "Why So Serious?" Xbox 360 Mod [PICS]
item.description: This Joker Xbox 360 mod is one of the greatest I have ever seen, because it is an ode to the Joker from the Dark Knight, includes the catch phrase ‘Why So Serious?’, has a cool Joker face popping out and also the Batman logo to hold it all together.

item.title: [+407] Need Your Lawn Trimmed? In Seattle, You Can Now Rent a Goat
item.description: Rent-a-Goat program allows you to clear away brush and unwanted foliage the way nature intended.

item.title: [+394] Huge House on a Small Rock at Rhode Island
item.description: Clingstone, an unusual and such a vintage, 103-year-old mansion in Rhode Island’s Narragansett Bay, survives through the love and hard work of family and friends.
